example.eg: The loud feedback when the microphone got too close to the speaker hurt everybody's ears.
example.egtrans: 麦克风靠扬声器太近，反馈噪音很大，吵得大家耳朵疼。

example.eg: The feedback generated during the experiment resulted in a return to equilibrium.
example.egtrans: 是实验过程中生成的自动调节，造成了平衡的回归。

example.eg: The website encourages its visitors to give feedback about what they like and don't like about it.
example.egtrans: 网站欢迎访客提供反馈信息：他们喜欢这个网站什么，不喜欢什么。

example.eg: Jamie always feeds back to his line manager in a timely manner.
example.egtrans: 杰米总是及时向他的电话经理提供反馈。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 向...提供反馈, 向...报告

example.eg: Karen appreciates her staff feeding back intormation to her on a regular basis.
example.egtrans: 凯伦很感谢她的员工能定期向她反馈信息。

dsense.name: feed back into [sth], feed back to [sth]

example.eg: The results of the student survey feed back into future teaching practices.
example.egtrans: 学生调查的结果能够反过来指导未来的教学实践。

example.eg: The author received a lot of negative feedback about his new book.
They gave her some positive feedback on her article but didn't publish it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 正面反馈, 正面回馈, 好的反应
